entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:19 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 2:23 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -37.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. POP 30%
